name: Anti-Magic
description:
A game I made in 3 hours for Trijam #145.

You are trapped in a magical snare. You will need to dispel the magic holding you in place. To do this, you will need to counter the existing runes from the trap with runes of your own.

Every rune consists of a color and a symbol. You must counter both for all 3 runes of the trap to escape.

Press space to open your Rune Book and see which symbols and colors counter each other. Press space again to close.

Dev Notes:

I had never tried making a game in 3 hours before, and my original idea was way too ambitious for the time I needed to get it done in. I ended up having to cut about 2/3 of the planned content (and there are bugs galore), but it's at least playable and I am proud of that.

Credits:

Dungeon Tiles - https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-tileset-4

Wood Box - https://opengameart.org/content/wooden-box-2d

Wizard - https://opengameart.org/content/crazy-wizard

Additional Art Assets by Kenney - https://www.kenney.nl/assets

I ran out of time to add music or sound effects, but I would have liked to use this:

https://opengameart.org/content/mage-theme
